Choosing the Right Functionality for You.title: Choosing the Right Functionality for Your App Clip

abstract.text: Review frameworks available to App Clips and identify functionality that makes a great App Clip.

Creating an App Clip with Xcode.title: Creating an App Clip with Xcode

abstract.text: Add an App Clip target to your Xcode project and share code between the App Clip and its corresponding full app.

Associating Your App Clip with Your Webs.title: Associating Your App Clip with Your Website

abstract.text: Enable the system to verify your App Clip's invocation URL, and configure the domain's server to provide approval.

Configuring Your App Clip’s Launch Exper.title: Configuring Your App Clip’s Launch Experience

abstract.text: Review how users launch your App Clip, identify invocation URLs, and configure experiences in App Store Connect.

Supporting Invocations from Your Website.title: Supporting Invocations from Your Website and the Messages App

abstract.text: Display a Smart App Banner on your website that users tap to launch your App Clip, and add support for invocations from the Messages app.
Add code to respond to invocations and offer a focused launch experience.
Add code to quickly confirm the user’s physical location while respecting their privacy.
Help users discover your App Clip by using an NFC-integrated or scan-only App Clip Code.

Preparing Multiple App Clip Codes for Pr.title: Preparing Multiple App Clip Codes for Production

abstract.text: Prepare your App Clip Codes to send to a professional printing service.

Tracking App Clip Codes in an AR Session.title: Tracking App Clip Codes in an AR Session

abstract.text: Manage the App Clip Codes that provide access to information and options in your AR app.

Recommending an App Clip’s Corresponding.title: Recommending an App Clip’s Corresponding App

abstract.text: Display an overlay in your App Clip to recommend your app to users.

Making Data Available to the App Clip’s.title: Making Data Available to the App Clip’s Corresponding App

abstract.text: Add the App Groups capability and make data stored in your App Clip available to its corresponding app.
Enable your App Clip to schedule and receive notifications for a short or extended time period.

Testing Your App Clip’s Launch Experienc.title: Testing Your App Clip’s Launch Experience

abstract.text: Test your App Clip and its launch experience by debugging invocations, creating local experiences for testing, and launching App Clips from the TestFlight app.
Archive an App Clip’s corresponding app, upload it to App Store Connect, and distribute it to testers or publish it on the App Store.
